content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Most active communities in India\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Disruption is the buzzword in the world of technology and is the backbone of all new future trends of the industry. But it does not happen in isolation. A deep knowledge base and collaboration is required to bring about any kind of disruption. At EPAM India, we are always looking for ways to disrupt the status quo and bring forth new trends that adds value not just to our clients but also to our own knowledge and engineering culture. EPAM has always encouraged dedicated spaces for learning through collaboration – and Community Building is one such initiative.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Community Building Initiative aims at building a well-networked global engineering community, at the center of which lies the EPAM culture of Engineering DNA. Community Building is emerging as a great space to play and explore with technology - for curious minds and innovative callings. The geeks of EPAM have finally found their arena!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"JAVA USER GROUP\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TESTING COMMUNITY\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CLOUD & DEVOPS COMMUNITY \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM INDIA HACKATHON\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM India Hackathon was our first-ever local hackathon where EPAMers formed teams and coded together for 36 hours to come up with a feasible solution to a business problem centered around the topic of helping EPAM improve their hiring process.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM DOJO\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Dojo is a platform that implements the deliberate practice paradigm and edutainment concepts. It is open source, engages engineers into a process of continuous learning, and builds a crowdsourcing community of contributors from developers to production trainers.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GLOBAL DAY OF CODE RETREAT\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Global Day of Code Retreat is an annual day-long, intensive practice event focusing on the fundamentals of software development and design, and provides developers with the opportunity to take part in focused practice, away from the pressure of ‘getting things done’.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"BUILD-A-THON\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Build-a-thon is EngX Week’s most coveted event, where 10 teams come together to build an application or accelerator in four days, outside of their routine project deliverables.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Culture of Togetherness & EPAM Clubs\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Culture of togetherness is a spectrum that encompasses our diverse teams into one EPAM. It is an expression of our pride, our sense of belonging and our reason for being.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rIt grows and thrives through disruptive ideas we bring to work each day. It adds on vibrancy with every success and milestone we achieve. It gives us an environment to grow and succeed. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rEPAM India is poised for high growth and achievement, and we must scale these new heights together as a team!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAfterall, EPAM is us and we are EPAM – Together We Are.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":84416,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f70f6621-eaac-4033-badf-1c23b0805589/together.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f70f6621-eaac-4033-badf-1c23b0805589/together.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"together.JPG\",\"name\":\"together.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f70f6621-eaac-4033-badf-1c23b0805589\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":676,\"height\":463},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In 2019, we launched EPAM Clubs to bring passionate people together to engage them with their hobbies. We saw some great excitement and participation in these clubs. Living our passion and working towards excelling at it is the core of what we do at EPAM India. Continuing those efforts, we had launched more clubs in 2020. Below is the list of clubs which are active: Music Club\\r, Dance Club\\r, Drama Club\\r, Artisans Club\\r, Wanders Club\\r, Healthy U Club\\r, Sports Club\\r, Photography Club\\r, Cooking Club \\r, Know Your Self Club \\r, Literary Club , Event management Club, Naturalists’ (Contributing for Sustainability of Nature), Toastmasters Club\\r, Event Management Club\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
